properties.areaDesc: Lewiston Area; Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 4 at 3:56AM PST until February 5 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...Active Winter Weather Returns to the Area...

.A Pacific storm system will bring snow to all elevations of the
region beginning Tuesday afternoon and continuing into Wednesday.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches
in the Lewiston and Clarkston area, with 4 to 6 inches
accumulation near Alpowa Summit.

* WHERE...Lewiston, Lapwai, Peck, Culdesac, Gifford, Lewiston
Grade, Clarkston, and Pomeroy.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will start this evening and
increase in intensity overnight.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY
